sense.gloss: fun (one tenth of a monme, 5.787 grains)
amount, worth (as in "two days' worth"), enough (for)
one's means, one's place, one's lot, one's social position
condition, state (of affairs), extent, rate (as in "at this rate")
in proportion to, just as much as, to the same degree
to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to see, to get, to follow
to become clear, to be known, to be discovered, to be realized, to be realised, to be found out
I know!, I think so too!
very, extremely, surprisingly, considerably, awfully, terribly
dispersion, breakup, scattering, decentralization, decentralisation, distribution
department, section, branch, course, school (e.g. of learning)
disassembly, dismantling, disaggregating, taking apart, breaking up, analysis, parsing
taking on one's share (e.g. of work), dividing (work, expenses, etc.) between, apportionment, allotment, allocation, assignment
decentralization of authority, decentralisation of authority
division, section, demarcation, partition, segmentation, subdivision, (traffic) lane, compartment, classification, sorting
division, splitting, sharing, distribution, dissemination, allocation
water, liquid, fluid, moisture, humidity, sap, juice
to divide (into), to split (into), to part, to separate, to divide up, to classify, to sort out, to divide out
to share, to distribute, to deal out, to dish out
to distinguish, to discriminate, to differentiate (between)
to break up (a fight), to mediate
to call a draw, to tie
to push one's way through (a crowd)
for the present, for the time being
for a while (from now), for some time (to come)
one's say, one's point, one's case, one's claim
to branch, to fork, to diverge
to separate, to split, to divide

one-tenth, one percent (one-tenth of a wari), 3 mm (one-tenth of a sun), 2.4 mm (one-tenth of a mon, a traditional unit used to measure shoe sizes), 0.1 degree (one-tenth of a do, used to measure body temperature on any temperature scale)
one-quarter of a ryō (obsolete unit of currency)
one-tenth of a monme of silver

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓と↑言↑↓い↓ったら↑良↑↓よ↓いか↑分↑↓わ↓かりません。
sdata.e: I'm at a loss for words.

sdata.j: ↑時間↑↓じかん↓があるか↑分↑↓わ↓かりません。
sdata.e: I don't know if I have the time.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓ったようだ。
sdata.e: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.

sdata.j: ↑自分勝手↑↓じぶんがって↓にするつもりはない。
sdata.e: I don't intend to be selfish.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓き↑過↑↓す↓ぎたものであっても、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えをなくしたくない。
sdata.e: I don't want to lose my ideas, even though some of them are a bit extreme.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓のかっこ↑良↑↓よ↓さをわざと↑隠↑↓かく↓すということ？
sdata.e: You are saying you intentionally hide your good looks?

sdata.j: それがどこから↑来↑↓き↓たのか↑分↑↓わ↓からなかった。
sdata.e: I didn't know where it came from.

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓が↑言↑↓い↓いたいのか↑分↑↓わ↓からないなあ。
sdata.e: I don't know what you mean.

sdata.j: ↑分↑↓わ↓からない↑言葉↑↓ことば↓がたくさんある。
sdata.e: There are many words that I don't understand.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓よりも↑物知↑↓ものし↓りな↑数学↑↓すうがく↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓が↑自分↑↓じぶん↓のことをはっきりと↑表現↑↓ひょうげん↓できていないのを↑見↑↓み↓るのは↑心地↑↓ここち↓の↑良↑↓よ↓いものではない。
sdata.e: I don't like it when mathematicians who know much more than I do can't express themselves explicitly.

sdata.j: こんなに↑明↑↓あき↓らかなことをわざわざどうやって↑説明↑↓せつめい↓したらいいのか↑分↑↓わ↓からない。
sdata.e: I don't know how to demonstrate it, since it's too obvious!

sdata.j: ↑誰↑↓だれ↓にも↑分↑↓わ↓からないよ。
sdata.e: No one will know.

sdata.j: ↑答↑↓こた↓えが↑分↑↓わ↓かったんだ、でもあまりにすぐに↑分↑↓わ↓かったものだから↑正解↑↓せいかい↓であるはずがないんだ。
sdata.e: I found a solution, but I found it so fast that it can't be the right solution.

sdata.j: もう↑何↑↓なに↓をしたらいいか↑分↑↓わ↓からない。
sdata.e: I don't know what to do anymore.

sdata.j: いつかフランスに↑行↑↓い↓くことは↑避↑↓さ↓けられない、それがいつかは↑分↑↓わ↓からないけれど。
sdata.e: It is inevitable that I go to France someday, I just don't know when.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓には↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こるか↑分↑↓わ↓かるんじゃないかと↑思↑↓おも↓うけどね。
sdata.e: You can probably guess what happens though.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑次↑↓つぎ↓に↑分↑↓わ↓かることは↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓に↑載↑↓の↓るってことだ。
sdata.e: Next thing you know, you'll be in the papers.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がロボットではないってことは↑分↑↓わ↓かる。
sdata.e: It only shows you're not a robot.

sdata.j: まだ↑持↑↓も↓ってるか↑分↑↓わ↓からないなあ。
sdata.e: I don't know if I still have it.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓でどれほどのことが↑学↑↓まな↓べるか、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓でもびっくりするはずだよ！
sdata.e: You'd be surprised what you can learn in a week.

sdata.j: ↑止↑↓と↓めて！あなたは↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑気分↑↓きぶん↓を↑害↑↓がい↓してるわ。
sdata.e: Stop it! You're making her feel uncomfortable!

sdata.j: ↑誰↑↓だれ↓も↑私↑↓わたし↓のことを↑分↑↓わ↓かってくれない。
sdata.e: Nobody understands me.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓がしなければならないことそれぞれの↑背後↑↓はいご↓には↑自分↑↓じぶん↓たちがしたい↑何↑↓なに↓かがあると↑思↑↓おも↓うんだ。
sdata.e: I suppose that behind each thing we have to do, there's something we want to do...

sdata.j: うまく↑言↑↓い↓えないんだけど・・・↑自分↑↓じぶん↓も↑理解↑↓りかい↓していないことを↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑説明↑↓せつめい↓しようとしてるんだ。
sdata.e: I'm so dumb... I'm trying to explain things to you that I don't understand myself.

sdata.j: もっと↑成績↑↓せいせき↓を↑気↑↓き↓にかけられればいいのだけれど、でも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓のある↑点↑↓てん↓において↑成績↑↓せいせき↓はそんなに↑重要↑↓じゅうよう↓ではないと↑分↑↓わ↓かったんだ。
sdata.e: I wish I could care more about my grades but it seems that, at a certain point of my life, I decided they wouldn't be so important anymore.

sdata.j: ↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓は↑八↑↓はち↓↑時↑↓じ↓↑三↑↓さん↓↑十↑↓じゅっ↓↑分↑↓ぷん↓から↑始↑↓はじ↓まるから。
sdata.e: Class doesn't begin until eight-thirty.

sdata.j: ↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓は８↑時↑↓じ↓３０↑分↑↓ふん↓までは↑始↑↓はじ↓まらない。
sdata.e: Class doesn't begin until eight-thirty.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑顔↑↓かお↓が、パスポートの↑顔写真↑↓かおじゃしん↓のようになってきたら、↑旅↑↓たび↓に↑出↑↓で↓た↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: When you're beginning to look like the photo in your passport, you should go on a holiday.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓に↑疑問↑↓ぎもん↓を↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑良識↑↓りょうしき↓の↑第一歩↑↓だいいっぽ↓だ。
sdata.e: To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.

sdata.j: 「↑気分↑↓きぶん↓はどうですか」と↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑尋↑↓たず↓ねた。
sdata.e: How do you feel? he inquired.
